Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 65 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
